thinking: My task is to approach the visible door and open it. I see a wooden door in the center of my view, slightly to the right-hand side, at the end of a stone path. To get closer to the door, I will move forward.
I've moved closer to the building. The door is now more clearly visible and is on the right-hand side of my view. To face it directly before moving closer, I will turn to the right.
After turning, the door is now mostly in the center of my view, slightly to the left-hand side. I need to get closer to it to be able to open it. I will move forward.

I am now standing directly in front of the door, which is centered in my view. The doorknob is visible on the right-hand side of the door. The task is to approach and open the door, so I will now attempt to open it.
I have successfully opened the door. The interior of the building is now visible. My task was to approach the visible door and open it, and this has been accomplished.
